reviewText: truely the highess thank's . The set of TV series SOAP is outstanding! It came in great shape . That saying a lot to the number of tapes in the set. On top of that, I got it very quicky. I order a set the same size, from a other CO. THe set was called LOST IN SPACE, it was lost in space all right, it took the full leigh of time, down to the last hours to get to me. Beleive me ! I don't spend much time on these reviews. But in your case how can I recieve a great work in the set you send me, and not say THANK'S  P.S. Looking forward in ordering other tapes from your.  The Guy that will enjoy this Show for manny years, Art.
